attributes.action:
Ban SHAIRA law
contrary to article 18 of the humans rights act & equality act.
attributes.additional_details:
The petition has been brought up in the past under; https://petition.parliament.uk/archived/petitions/48352The petition has brought up in the past.

 Theresa May should immediately reject this and people should be aware what SHAIRA law is all about  as it condemns peoples human rights and settles issues outside of normal court and legal systems in UK. It condemns normal rights of UK citizens and uses religion as the disguise in order to facilitate hatred towards women and others.
attributes.background: Due to evidence shaira law prohibits women's rights and discriminates those from different religions or wanting to change.  It gives permission for religion to dictate even unofficially to others how one should live their lives in breach of article 18 humans rights and the equality act 2010.
